title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Using Ecological Network Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic professional knowledge related to job roles
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance practical language skills required in workplace environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Emphasizes learner interaction and environmental integration based on ecological network learning theory

learning_goals: Learners can utilize over 10 job-related professional language expressions through collaborative problem-solving in an ecological network environment.
Learners can complete peer feedback-based language tasks at least three times using interactive tools in an online learning ecosystem.
Learners can develop and submit a project applying language strategies acquired within a networked learning ecosystem to real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
